channel.title: Rob's Blog | Python • Rust • Ramblings? - debugging

item.title: TIL: Flowistry tool to understand information flow in Rust
item.author: Unknown
item.description: When watching the excellent talk Rust for Everyone by Will Crichton the item that stood out as potentially most useful day to day was Flowistry. It is a VSCode extension, when a user clicks a variable the extension greys out all code that the variable does not interact with, it seems like it could be very useful when debugging.
